comment: /**  * Initialize the given DataBinder.  * @param binder the DataBinder to initialize  * @since 5.0  */
code: /**  * Initialize the given DataBinder.  * @param binder the DataBinder to initialize  * @since 5.0  */ void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder).

comment: /**  * Initialize the given DataBinder for the given (Servlet) request.  * @param binder the DataBinder to initialize  * @param request the web request that the data binding happens within  * @deprecated as of 5.0 in favor of {@link #initBinder(WebDataBinder)}  */
code: /**  * Initialize the given DataBinder for the given (Servlet) request.  * @param binder the DataBinder to initialize  * @param request the web request that the data binding happens within  * @deprecated as of 5.0 in favor of {@link #initBinder(WebDataBinder)}  */ @Deprecated default void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder, WebRequest request) {     initBinder(binder). }
